page.title: 17Whippet Racing in Warsop.
page.content:
Whippet racing has been a popular sport for over 20 years in Warsop. Regular weekly meetings of the Meden Valley Whippet Racing Club are held every Tuesday evening on the Carrs. The Carrs is an area of reclaimed flat grassland beside the River Meden next to the Mill Dam.
Usually about 20 dogs are raced in various club events.On a pleasant summer evening a crowd of owners and spectators turns out to enjoy this exciting entertainment.
Open meetings take place frequently where non_members may race their dogs. At these meetings about 80 dogs participate after "weighing in" at the Plough Inn.
